settings.heading: What is the delivery schedule?
settings.row_content: Delivery time is from Monday and Thursday at 4 pm

settings.heading: What types of leather products does Xinabelle Store offer?
settings.row_content: At Xinabelle Store, we specialize in a variety of high-quality leather goods. Our product range includes handcrafted leather wallets, elegant purses, durable belts, and an array of stylish accessories. Each product is designed with a focus on both functionality and fashion.

settings.heading: How can I care for my leather items to ensure their longevity?
settings.row_content: To maintain the quality of your leather items, we recommend keeping them away from excessive moisture and direct sunlight. Use a soft, dry cloth for regular dusting and apply a leather conditioner occasionally to keep the material supple.

settings.heading: Does Xinabelle Store offer international shipping?
settings.row_content: Yes, we do! Xinabelle Store is delighted to serve an international clientele. Shipping fees and times vary depending on the destination. Please refer to our shipping policy for more details.

settings.heading: Can I return a product if I'm not satisfied?
settings.row_content: Absolutely. Customer satisfaction is our top priority. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund or exchange. Please review our return policy for specific terms and conditions

settings.heading: How do I know which size to choose when purchasing belts or wrist accessories?
settings.row_content: For the best fit, we advise measuring your wrist or waist before ordering. Our size guide provides detailed instructions and measurements to help you select the perfect size. If you're still unsure, our customer service team is here to assist you.
